org.jpacman.framework.model

Class PointManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpacman.framework.model.PointManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPointInspector

    public class PointManager
extends Object
implements IPointInspector
    Keep track of points (still) in the game.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, Jan 21, 2012
